age.Description: Age of participant at time of MRI scan.

rLEF.LongName: rate of change in longitudinal executive function
rLEF.Description: Metric for the rate of change in executive function, calculated from longitudinal measurements of cognitive performance tasks. For further details see supplementary material as referenced in dataset_description.

EF.Description: Metric for executive function, calculated from recent measurements of cognitive performance tasks. For further details see supplementary material as referenced in dataset_description.
